/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with power lines and traffic lights, a common sight in urban landscapes. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a construction site is visible, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere amidst the city's hustle and bustle.
